params.description: The place where the downloaded file will be stored
params.name: dest

params.description: downloadHandler: A progress callback function(received, total, statusCode), outputHandler: Default output callback function(out), redirects stdout when provided
params.name: options

methods.description: Outputs a string to the stdout unless an outputHandle is provided
methods.name: output

params.description: The callback(out) that will receive output instead of stdout
params.name: outputHandler
